DataElement.preferredName: Platelet  Prior Laboratory Procedure Blood Transfusion Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not platelets were transfused prior to the laboratory procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Platelet  Prior Laboratory Procedure Blood Transfusion
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An irregular, disc-shaped element in the blood that assists in blood clotting. Platelets are not blood cells, they are fragments of large bone marrow cells called megakaryocytes._Earlier in time or order._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The administration of blood or blood products into a blood vessel.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An irregular, disc-shaped element in the blood that assists in blood clotting. Platelets are not blood cells, they are fragments of large bone marrow cells called megakaryocytes.

Concepts.definition: An irregular, disc-shaped element in the blood that assists in blood clotting. Platelets are not blood cells, they are fragments of large bone marrow cells called megakaryocytes.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.:The administration of blood or blood products into a blood vessel.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
